root.name: Shock Wave
root.description: The player takes the role of a rookie codenamed Wildcard, one of Earth's last fighter pilots, and is assigned an F-177 Fighter. Gameplay is similar to Warhawk and Terminal Velocity, though with relatively confined mission areas and a fast moving jet, the player has little margin for error, as moving out of mission bounds result in instant death.The game and it's expansion pack Operation Jumpgate were later re-released in one package for the PlayStation, PC and Pippin under the name Shockwave Assault.
